verses.kjv: Whosoever believeth that Jesus is the Christ is born of God: and every one that loveth him that begat loveth him also that is begotten of him.
verses.web: Whoever believes that Jesus is the Christ has been born of God. Whoever loves the Father also loves the child who is born of him.
verses.ct: Everyone who believes that Jesus is the Christ has been born of God. And everyone who loves the Father also loves his children.

verses.kjv: By this we know that we love the children of God, when we love God, and keep his commandments.
verses.web: By this we know that we love the children of God, when we love God and keep his commandments.
verses.ct: Here's how we know we love God's children: we love God and obey his commandments.

verses.kjv: For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments: and his commandments are not grievous.
verses.web: For this is loving God, that we keep his commandments. His commandments are not grievous.
verses.ct: Loving God means keeping his commandments — and his commandments aren't a burden.

verses.kjv: For whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world: and this is the victory that overcometh the world, even our faith.
verses.web: For whatever is born of God overcomes the world. This is the victory that has overcome the world: your faith.
verses.ct: Everyone born of God overcomes the world. And this is the victory that has overcome the world: our faith.

verses.kjv: Who is he that overcometh the world, but he that believeth that Jesus is the Son of God?
verses.web: Who is he who overcomes the world, but he who believes that Jesus is the Son of God?
verses.ct: Who is it that overcomes the world? Only the one who believes that Jesus is the Son of God.

verses.kjv: This is he that came by water and blood, even Jesus Christ; not by water only, but by water and blood. And it is the Spirit that beareth witness, because the Spirit is truth.
verses.web: This is he who came by water and blood, Jesus Christ; not with the water only, but with the water and the blood. It is the Spirit who testifies, because the Spirit is the truth.
verses.ct: Jesus Christ is the one who came through water and blood — not by water alone, but by water and blood together. The Holy Spirit testifies to this, because the Holy Spirit is truth.

verses.kjv: For there are three that bear record in heaven, the Father, the Word, and the Holy Ghost: and these three are one.
verses.web: For there are three who testify:
verses.ct: There are 3 that testify in heaven: the Father, the Word, and the Holy Spirit — and these 3 are one.

verses.kjv: And there are three that bear witness in earth, the Spirit, and the water, and the blood: and these three agree in one.
verses.web: the Spirit, the water, and the blood; and the three agree as one.
verses.ct: And there are 3 that testify on earth: the Holy Spirit, the water, and the blood — and these 3 are in agreement.

verses.kjv: If we receive the witness of men, the witness of God is greater: for this is the witness of God which he hath testified of his Son.
verses.web: If we receive the witness of men, the witness of God is greater; for this is God’s testimony which he has testified concerning his Son.
verses.ct: We accept human testimony all the time, but God's testimony carries far greater weight. And this is God's testimony — what he has declared about his Son.

verses.kjv: He that believeth on the Son of God hath the witness in himself: he that believeth not God hath made him a liar; because he believeth not the record that God gave of his Son.
verses.web: He who believes in the Son of God has the testimony in himself. He who doesn’t believe God has made him a liar, because he has not believed in the testimony that God has given concerning his Son.
verses.ct: Anyone who believes in the Son of God has this testimony confirmed in his own heart. Anyone who doesn't believe God has essentially called him a liar, because he has rejected the testimony God gave about his Son.

verses.kjv: And this is the record, that God hath given to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.
verses.web: The testimony is this, that God gave to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.
verses.ct: And here is that testimony: God has given us eternal life, and this life is found in his Son.

verses.kjv: He that hath the Son hath life; and he that hath not the Son of God hath not life.
verses.web: He who has the Son has the life. He who doesn’t have God’s Son doesn’t have the life.
verses.ct: Whoever has the Son has life. Whoever doesn't have the Son of God doesn't have life.

verses.kjv: These things have I written unto you that believe on the name of the Son of God; that ye may know that ye have eternal life, and that ye may believe on the name of the Son of God.
verses.web: These things I have written to you who believe in the name of the Son of God, that you may know that you have eternal life, and that you may continue to believe in the name of the Son of God.
verses.ct: I've written these things to you who believe in the name of the Son of God so that you can know — with certainty — that you have eternal life, and so that you will continue to believe in the name of the Son of God.

verses.kjv: And this is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us:
verses.web: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.
verses.ct: This is the confidence we have when we come to God: if we ask anything according to his will, he hears us.

verses.kjv: And if we know that he hear us, whatsoever we ask, we know that we have the petitions that we desired of him.
verses.web: And if we know that he listens to us, whatever we ask, we know that we have the petitions which we have asked of him.
verses.ct: And if we know that he hears us in whatever we ask, then we know we already have what we've asked him for.

verses.kjv: If any man see his brother sin a sin which is not unto death, he shall ask, and he shall give him life for them that sin not unto death. There is a sin unto death: I do not say that he shall pray for it.
verses.web: If anyone sees his brother sinning a sin not leading to death, he shall ask, and God will give him life for those who sin not leading to death. There is a sin leading to death. I don’t say that he should make a request concerning this.
verses.ct: If you see a fellow believer committing a sin that doesn't lead to death, pray for that person, and God will give them life. This applies to sins that don't lead to death. But there is a sin that leads to death — I'm not saying you should pray about that one.

verses.kjv: All unrighteousness is sin: and there is a sin not unto death.
verses.web: All unrighteousness is sin, and there is a sin not leading to death.
verses.ct: Every kind of wrongdoing is sin, but not every sin leads to death.

verses.kjv: We know that whosoever is born of God sinneth not; but he that is begotten of God keepeth himself, and that wicked one toucheth him not.
verses.web: We know that whoever is born of God doesn’t sin, but he who was born of God keeps himself, and the evil one doesn’t touch him.
verses.ct: We know that no one born of God keeps on sinning. The one born of God guards himself, and the evil one cannot touch him.

verses.kjv: And we know that we are of God, and the whole world lieth in wickedness.
verses.web: We know that we are of God, and the whole world lies in the power of the evil one.
verses.ct: We know that we belong to God, but the entire world lies under the power of the evil one.

verses.kjv: And we know that the Son of God is come, and hath given us an understanding, that we may know him that is true, and we are in him that is true, even in his Son Jesus Christ. This is the true God, and eternal life.
verses.web: We know that the Son of God has come, and has given us an understanding, that we know him who is true, and we are in him who is true, in his Son Jesus Christ. This is the true God and eternal life.
verses.ct: We also know that the Son of God has come and has given us understanding so that we can know the one who is true. And we are in the one who is true — in his Son Jesus Christ. He is the true God and eternal life.

verses.kjv: Little children, keep yourselves from idols. Amen.
verses.web: Little children, keep yourselves from idols.
verses.ct: Dear children, guard yourselves from idols. Amen.
